issue.title: [JS] Add support for interval types in javascript
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5239](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5239). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update integration_test.py to include interval tests for JSTest once this is done.

comments.body:

We have the Interval year_month and day_time types in JS, but I'm not sure if this issue is about a new kind of Interval DataType. [~emkornfield@gmail.com], any thoughts?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5239?focusedCommentId=16846130) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
